Classes/SpeechToText.html#/s:FC14SpeechT.name: addWords(customizationID:words:failure:success:)
Classes/SpeechToText.html#/s:FC14SpeechT.abstract: Add one or more words to the custom language model, or replace the definition of an existing

Classes/SpeechToText.html#/s:FC14SpeechT.name: deleteWord(withName:customizationID:failure:success:)
Classes/SpeechToText.html#/s:FC14SpeechT.abstract: Delete a custom word from the specified custom model. If the word also exists in the service’s

Classes/SpeechToText.html#/s:FC14SpeechT.name: getWord(withName:customizationID:failure:success:)
Classes/SpeechToText.html#/s:FC14SpeechT.abstract: Get details of a word from a specific custom language model.

Classes/SpeechToText.html#/s:FC14SpeechT.name: addWord(withName:customizationID:word:failure:success:)
Classes/SpeechToText.html#/s:FC14SpeechT.abstract: Add a single custom word to the custom language model, or modify an existing word.

Classes/SpeechToTextSession.html#/s:vC14.name: serviceURL
Classes/SpeechToTextSession.html#/s:vC14.abstract: The base URL of the Speech to Text service.

Classes/SpeechToTextSession.html#/s:vC14.name: tokenURL
Classes/SpeechToTextSession.html#/s:vC14.abstract: The URL that shall be used to obtain a token.

Classes/SpeechToTextSession.html#/s:vC14.name: websocketsURL
Classes/SpeechToTextSession.html#/s:vC14.abstract: The URL that shall be used to stream audio for transcription.

Classes/SpeechToTextSession.html#/s:vC14.name: defaultHeaders
Classes/SpeechToTextSession.html#/s:vC14.abstract: The default HTTP headers for all requests to the service.

Classes/SpeechToTextSession.html#/s:vC14.name: results
Classes/SpeechToTextSession.html#/s:vC14.abstract: The results of the most recent recognition request.

Classes/SpeechToTextSession.html#/s:vC14.name: onConnect
Classes/SpeechToTextSession.html#/s:vC14.abstract: Invoked when the session connects to the Speech to Text service.

Classes/SpeechToTextSession.html#/s:vC14.name: onMicrophoneData
Classes/SpeechToTextSession.html#/s:vC14.abstract: Invoked with microphone audio when a recording audio queue buffer has been filled.

Classes/SpeechToTextSession.html#/s:vC14.name: onPowerData
Classes/SpeechToTextSession.html#/s:vC14.abstract: Invoked every 0.025s when recording with the average dB power of the microphone.

Classes/SpeechToTextSession.html#/s:vC14.name: onResults
Classes/SpeechToTextSession.html#/s:vC14.abstract: Invoked when transcription results are received for a recognition request.

Classes/SpeechToTextSession.html#/s:vC14.name: onError
Classes/SpeechToTextSession.html#/s:vC14.abstract: Invoked when an error or warning occurs.

Classes/SpeechToTextSession.html#/s:vC14.name: onDisconnect
Classes/SpeechToTextSession.html#/s:vC14.abstract: Invoked when the session disconnects from the Speech to Text service.

Classes/SpeechToTextSession.html#/s:FC14.name: connect()
Classes/SpeechToTextSession.html#/s:FC14.abstract: Connect to the Speech to Text service.

Classes/SpeechToTextSession.html#/s:FC14.name: startMicrophone(compress:)
Classes/SpeechToTextSession.html#/s:FC14.abstract: Start streaming microphone audio data to transcribe.

Classes/SpeechToTextSession.html#/s:FC14.name: stopMicrophone()
Classes/SpeechToTextSession.html#/s:FC14.abstract: Stop streaming microphone audio data to transcribe.

Classes/SpeechToTextSession.html#/s:FC14.name: keepAlive()
Classes/SpeechToTextSession.html#/s:FC14.abstract: Send a message to prevent the service from automatically disconnecting due to inactivity.

Classes/SpeechToTextSession.html#/s:FC14.name: disconnect()
Classes/SpeechToTextSession.html#/s:FC14.abstract: Wait for any queued recognition requests to complete then disconnect from the service.
